```
    sudo apt install git-buildpackage
    mkdir fdk-aac-source
    cd fdk-aac-source

    cd fdk-aac
    gbp buildpackage
    sudo dpkg -i ../libfdk-aac2_*deb ../libfdk-aac-dev_*deb 
    ```
